title: Set Up a New Employee in the Payroll System
description: A new employee has been hired. The payroll specialist needs to add them to the payroll system before the next pay run.

tasks.description: Receive the new hire paperwork, including their W-4 for tax withholding and direct deposit information.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent receives all necessary forms and data.

tasks.description: Create a new employee record in the payroll system.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent successfully creates the new employee profile.

tasks.description: Enter the employee's salary, federal and state tax withholding information, benefit deductions, and direct deposit details.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent accurately enters all required payroll data.
